title: DEEP HYPNOTIC TRANCE FOR HEALING / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Non-verbal hypnosis can heal us deeply and in this video Dr. Marco Paret's students are doing non-verbal hypnosis exercises that heals the subject. The woman laying on the ground entered in a deep hypnotic state of induction, catalepsy and crisis. Crisis liberates our emotions and traumas, and changes us positively from within. Dr. Paret teaches his student how to use the most powerful and unique hypnosis techniques in a non-verbal way. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
